taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section tholiformes;species novanglicus;

treatment.description: With habit and coriaceous dark lustrous leaves somewhat as in no. 114, but broad-based prickles more scattered; primocane-leaflets abruptly short-acuminate and pilose along nerves beneath; inflorescence an open broad raceme with unarmed pedicels up to 4 cm. long; calyx not reflexed in fruit; petals 1.2 cm. long, 5-6 mm. broad.
